PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_MaterialWoodBasedStructure
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties about Material of Wood Based Structure.

PropertyDef.Name: ApplicableStructuralDesignMethod
PropertyDef.Definition: Determines whether mechanical material properties are applicable to 'ASD' = allowable stress design (working stress design), 'LSD' = limit state design, or 'LRFD' = load and resistance factor design.
